Question: The soldiers responded with, "Vive L'Empereur!" and marched with this person to Paris; Louis XVIII fled.
Hints: His Imperial Majesty **** I, By the Grace of God and the Constitutions of the Republic, Emperor of the French.
Joséphine had her daughter Hortense marry this person's brother Louis.
This person's father had died of stomach cancer, though this was seemingly unknown at the time of the autopsy.
